title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t0.0
text: Launching a new AI initiative is quite different from launching a new technology platform,

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t8.6
text: like an ERP.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t10.68
text: Find out the key differences on today's episode.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t14.280000000000001
text: I'm Nitsan Mekilberbrog from eBay and you're listening to me, myself and AI.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t21.16
text: Welcome to Me, Myself and AI, a podcast on artificial intelligence and business.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t25.66
text: Each episode we introduce you to someone innovating with AI.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t28.88
text: I'm Sam Ransabotham, Professor of Information Systems at Boston College.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t33.08
text: I'm also the guest editor for the AI and Business Strategy Big Ideas Program at MIT Sloan Management Review.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t39.239999999999995
text: And I'm Shervin Khodoban, the senior partner with BCG and I also co-lead BCG's AI practice in North America.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t45.96
text: Together, MIT SMR and BCG have been researching AI for six years now, interviewing hundreds of practitioners

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t53.32
text: and surveying thousands of companies on what it takes to build and deploy and scale AI capabilities across the organization

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t61.32
text: and really transform the way organizations operate.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t65.48
text: Shervin and I are excited today to be talking with Nitsan Mekilberbrog, the Chief AI Officer at eBay.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t70.76
text: Nitsan, thanks for taking the time to talk with us. Welcome.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t73.28
text: Thanks so much. Excited to be here.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t75.52
text: You've got a relatively new position within the last year or so.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t78.32
text: Can you tell us what your role is at eBay?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t81.0
text: Sure. Before me, my predecessors, so to speak, have all been chief AI scientists.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t86.52
text: And the change to chief AI officer was actually a strategic one with the recognition that AI is more than just the machine learning models,

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t98.32
text: that AI is the engineering that it takes to productionize those models at scale.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t104.8
text: And of course, the business impact and business use cases, we really think of AI as an end-to-end experience.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t113.75999999999999
text: All right, so eBay is pretty excited about this. What is eBay hoping to gain from this?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t118.12
text: I think opportunities in every facet of our business, as probably most companies our size would say as well.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t126.75999999999999
text: I think for us, probably what we're most excited about and the reason that I joined eBay late last year,

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t134.35999999999999
text: what made me excited is the ability to create AI-led tools, essentially, that we put into the hands of our customers,

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t144.2
text: both buyers and sellers, to create their own experiences that they share with each other.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t151.04
text: It's not just about us using AI to build things, but rather us building AI tooling to enable our buyers and sellers to build things.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t162.51999999999998
text: And I think that's really exciting.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t164.79999999999998
text: Give us an example of one of those.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t166.64
text: Most recently, we rolled out our new 3D visualization experience, which is using computer vision on the back end to do the processing and some of the rendering.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t181.35999999999999
text: It's not about us using this technology to create 3D visualizations, but rather we're enabling through our mobile app,

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t192.28
text: our sellers to create visualizations of their own items at scale and in a sort of super easy way that doesn't require professional equipment.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t203.76
text: What do you think that eBay is doing uniquely in artificial intelligence?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t208.0
text: I'll start with sort of the approach and then I'll get into an example or two.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t213.36
text: From an approach perspective, I think we're going at it in a unique way because we're a two-sided marketplace.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t220.07999999999998
text: We worry about buyers and sellers, and so much of our attention is on building capabilities for our customers to use versus building experiences ourselves directly.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t235.79999999999998
text: Building tools for our customers to build experiences, I do think is unique.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t241.32
text: It's unique also from a technology perspective because there's a different level of resilience that's needed and you have to test

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t250.4
text: far greater number of ways in which it can fail when you're not actually building the experience yourself.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t257.92
text: You're putting tools in the hands of others to do so.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t260.36
text: It's almost like we are software as a service within an e-commerce company.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t267.96
text: So that's sort of one aspect of it.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t270.0
text: In terms of specific areas of focus that are maybe unique, we are sort of double downing now on

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t279.03999999999996
text: visual experiences.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t280.68
text: We can say computer vision, but I think of it a little bit more broadly than computer vision as AI approach and thinking of it as intelligent visual experiences that are immersive, interactive, adaptive, etc.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t296.08000000000004
text: 3D is sort of the tip of the iceberg, right?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t299.72
text: But as we get deeper into the quote unquote metaverse and deeper and deeper into ways in which our digital platform is more than just a place to do the commerce itself.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t318.2
text: We think that visual experiences in real time, live interaction between people, ways of visualizing products that feel like they're in your hands versus just being on a screen is something that will be transformational for eBay.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t335.96000000000004
text: You've got a very interesting background, bookings.com, Capital One, Hearst, Boston Scientific.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t341.92
text: Maybe you could tell us a little bit about how you ended up where you are.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t345.8
text: And one of the things that I want to harp on, perhaps, is that a lot of our guests tend to focus on the artificial part of artificial intelligence.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t354.15999999999997
text: But your background is actually in the intelligence part, like the actual human intelligence with your research on brains and how brains evolve.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t362.56
text: So I think that's a fascinating different angle.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t365.64
text: You're coming much more from the intelligence part than from the technology part.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t370.08
text: How did you get to where you are and how did you learn these lessons?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t376.08
text: Thanks for listening to Me, Myself and AI.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t378.48
text: Our show is able to continue in large part due to listener support.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t381.92
text: Your streams and downloads make a big difference.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t384.64
text: If you have a moment, please consider leaving us an Apple podcast review or a rating on Spotify and share our show with others you think might find it interesting and helpful.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t398.44
text: It's interesting.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t399.15999999999997
text: I actually, I was planning on being a lab biologist or geneticist.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t404.28
text: The problem was that I was terrible at the bench.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t407.52
text: Anything that I needed to use my hands for never worked.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t411.36
text: None of my experiments worked.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t412.8
text: Everything was a flop.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t414.03999999999996
text: So I quickly learned, well, I'm good with coding and computer algorithms.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t420.64
text: Maybe I'll focus on more theoretical aspects of biology.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t424.48
text: And then I got immersed in the world of neuroscience and computational genomics.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t430.08
text: And that's by the way, how I got introduced to neural networks.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t433.6
text: It's interesting because me and all my peers, that's how we entered what ended up being machine learning applications in business.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t443.84000000000003
text: And I had no awareness that engineering, essentially, and computer science were playing such a big role on the other side of a somewhat academic fence.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t455.71999999999997
text: To me, it seemed like a very obvious progression as I was working on modeling how real brains, so to speak, work and how human intelligence works.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t466.2
text: Moving from there into artificial intelligence seemed like a very natural progression and I wasn't alone in this.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t474.92
text: But then I got introduced to this whole other set of folks coming at it from the other end.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t480.72
text: The progression that you're seeing me jumping around from one industry to another isn't accidental.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t488.2
text: I spent the first half of my career in healthcare because it was very natural.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t492.04
text: I did my graduate work in essentially machine learning methods for genomic analysis because he was the human genome era, et cetera.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t502.2
text: And so I stayed in healthcare, but at some point I really wanted to see how AI can be used in other industries.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t509.4
text: And so I fairly purposefully moved from financial services to online travel to e-commerce.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t517.1999999999999
text: As you have traversed a wide array of sectors and industries, what did you find was one of the biggest hurdles in getting AI at scale in these organizations?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t531.0
text: All these people, they always get in the way.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t534.56
text: Spoken like a true junior.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t537.04
text: It's hard to get a whole group of people with different incentives to coordinate together in a way that is needed.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t547.3199999999999
text: Doing AI at scale and in a way that could drive transformational value does require a much broader set of players playing nicely together.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t558.24
text: And while typically everyone is on board that it's the right answer, the prioritization of that versus the very immediate term business objectives is what typically end up faltering.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t573.88
text: Part of your background that I was interested in is that one of your dissertation findings was that the human brain is still evolving and getting smarter.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t583.08
text: I think you may be in a unique position to compare, but I assume artificial intelligence is also getting smarter.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t591.16
text: Tell us a little about what you see happening in terms of these rates.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t594.28
text: Are the machines getting smarter faster than humans are getting smarter or humans still continuing to outpace?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t600.2
text: I'm kind of curious what your perspective is on those two things.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t604.04
text: You really dusted off some old things that you were looking at in the background.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t609.72
text: I appreciate you digging.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t611.8399999999999
text: You know, I think there's two things I would pick up there that I do find interesting on a sort of philosophical level almost.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t619.3199999999999
text: The first one is that when we look back in history, both recent and longer term, we look at these macro changes and then we assume that because those happen over long periods of time, that they're almost episodic.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t634.04
text: It's not something that you would observe day to day, but as any geneticist would tell you, evolution is just population genetics happening over a longer time scale.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t647.4399999999999
text: It's not as if it's something that is episodic.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t650.64
text: It's something that's actually continuous.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t652.64
text: And in that sense, I think it's not surprising that humans have continued to evolve and are continuing to evolve.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t664.3199999999999
text: It's just the nature of biology.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t667.48
text: What's happened in the most recent history of human species is that the variation in signals and the speed of that variation being introduced is just accelerating massively.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t680.4
text: Right?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t680.76
text: And because of that, we're able to adapt faster and faster and faster and in that sense become, quote unquote, smarter, maybe more adaptive is a better way.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t692.0400000000001
text: And I think it's the same with what's happening with technology now.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t696.64
text: There's a lot of discussion about children being exposed to digital technologies, et cetera, and the rate at which technology is changing.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t703.84
text: So the signals that people are getting, the variation in signals is just getting more and more and more.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t709.0
text: And so people's brains are becoming increasingly adaptive.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t713.9200000000001
text: There's somewhat of an analogy with AI there where really the amount of data, the variation in signals that we're feeding our models is continuously growing exponentially.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t726.0400000000001
text: And so of course the models are becoming more and more flexible and adaptive as well.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t732.6
text: Nitsan, you've been pretty vocal about AI not being just a fancy technology or a series of fancy algorithms just because they're cool and awesome.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t746.24
text: Which they are.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t746.96
text: But there has to be a purpose for it.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t748.6800000000001
text: There has to be a real need for it.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t751.16
text: Comment more about that meta framing of AI strategy and its alignment with business and corporate strategy at eBay or in general the purpose of AI.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t761.9599999999999
text: Cause I know you've been pretty vocal about that.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t764.7199999999999
text: Yeah, I've probably been pretty vocal cause I learned it the hard way, getting somewhat burnt in my earlier years of my career.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t771.68
text: Coming into a new company and thinking I knew it all, that I knew it better than everyone because I understood the technology and what's going on under the hood.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t780.68
text: And I learned the hard way, as I say, that it's a lot more nuanced than sort of brute forcing a technology onto a theoretical use case that you might think of.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t795.0799999999999
text: It's really important to understand the business context in which these technologies are deployed and understanding it deeply.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t805.2
text: So for example, early on in my career, when I was in financial services, we were using AI for a lot of automation, workflow automation.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t814.96
text: There's huge amounts of savings in the sort of hundreds of millions of dollars a year.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t820.48
text: And to me, it felt obvious that certain applications, for example, with speech recognition and sort of intent detection, et cetera, in the call center would be an ideal fit.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t834.08
text: But it's only after I actually shadowed a number of agents and spent probably about a good month deep diving into the workflows that I understood that there's so much complexity there that it's really about the interaction between the human intelligence and the machine intelligence.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t852.2
text: And it was making assumptions that just weren't going to bear out in real life.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t857.2
text: So it's that move from what works in the lab to what works in real life that is really critical.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t864.4000000000001
text: And then of course, thinking about what's important to the business is not just a matter of what's important today, but really what's in the DNA of the company, because it takes time to not just build, but to deploy and get these things up and running.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t883.0
text: I don't know any one of my peers who's ever been able to get anything up and running at scale in a matter of probably less than a year until you see real impact.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t895.5999999999999
text: And honestly, it's often quite a bit longer than that.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t898.4
text: It's a marathon.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t899.1999999999999
text: It's not a sprint.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t900.1999999999999
text: And so you really have to be conscious of what will be the business strategy two, three, four years down the road, not just what is on the executive's mind today.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t910.6
text: I want to pick up on something you said about automation, which is one of the larger themes that AI is being used.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t918.8000000000001
text: But I think you also alluded to it.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t922.0
text: I think it's unfortunate that when most people think about AI, they tend to think of it as the extreme case of it's going to replace human.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t930.6
text: And you're talking about the importance of what I call the middle ground, where human and AI work together so that human-AI interaction is key.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t942.0
text: Perhaps that's also one of the reasons it's so hard to scale, because you've got to figure out how humans will work differently with AI.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t950.0
text: Can you share some stories or insights about how you've done that?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t955.6
text: Because it requires changing the mindset of humans and what they normally do.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t962.3
text: I can give you a couple of examples that I'm seeing at eBay, but honestly, a lot of what I'm seeing at eBay I've seen before.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t970.4
text: The transformation stage that we're on now is one that virtually every company is on and no one is fully there yet.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t979.2
text: So if you think on the back office side, specifically customer service, I think that anxiety is typically most acute there because frankly, they've seen it before with other technologies.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t993.3000000000001
text: This isn't their first rodeo.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t995.2
text: And in truth, over the course of the maturation of the technology, there are individual roles that are no longer needed.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1005.7
text: That is true.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1007.2
text: But it's not that humans aren't needed.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1009.2
text: It's just that the role that they do changes.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1011.7
text: For example, on the customer service side, what we are doing at eBay, we tried for the past few years to inject AI in different places of the flow.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1021.2
text: And it was very challenging, both from a tech debt perspective, because there's just a lot of tech debt in different places that made it hard to do that.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1031.4
text: To make it more concrete, I'll give a real example.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1034.2
text: Intent detection.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1035.6
text: A customer calls and as they're talking to you, there is a model that's picking up on what they think the customer is trying to answer.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1045.6
text: So it's supposed to help the agent go to the right pages for help surface the right information.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1052.1
text: Think about that poor agent, though.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1054.6
text: He's talking to a customer who typically when they call, it's not because they're happy.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1058.6
text: When a customer calls customer service, it's because they're frustrated.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1061.6
text: They're trying to help them while at the same time getting these messages on the screen.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1066.6
text: And that ability to multitask and pay attention to this thing that's flashing at them with intents can be more of a distraction than a help.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1076.6
text: What we're doing now is undertaking a more end-to-end approach where we're really replacing or transforming customer service back end

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1087.6
text: so that both the systems that the agents are using and the systems that the models are running on are designed together from the get-go so there's a much better interplay.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1100.6
text: And we have also a lot of our designers, much more creative than our AI folks in many ways, helping think through what that interplay should look like,

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1111.6
text: doing a lot of user research testing with agents on how they would interface with customers and technology at the same time.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1119.6
text: The verb you used, inject, was interesting. You used that as saying that it didn't work to inject. It didn't work to band-aid it on or just to paste it on.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1129.6
text: Well, another thing I wanted to pick up on, Sam, is, I think you made a comment like this is not their first rodeo with technology.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1137.6
text: They've seen other technologies. And I'm interested in your views on how AI might be, or how AI is different compared to all the prior, let's say, technologies that came and transformed functions or processes

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1155.6
text: and whether you think there's any misconceptions there. Like people anchoring maybe, oh, well, this is just another ERP technology, or like we did with some other technologies, it's the same.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1167.6
text: And I wonder whether you agree with that or whether you think there's a misconception to treat it the same and what the difference might be with anything else people might be referencing or anchoring on based on their prior experiences.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1181.6
text: Yeah, I think any specific piece of AI technology is comparable to an ERP system or some other version. But as a paradigm, it's a much bigger thing. I think the better analogy is the digital transformation.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1197.6
text: The change from brick and mortar to digital is probably more at the level of analogy. Even where we are now, I would say, is a paradigm shift akin to the digital paradigm shift much more than just the introduction of some new ERP or CRM, et cetera.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1219.6
text: So, Nitsan, we have a new segment where we ask our guests a series of rapid fire questions. Just answer with the first response that comes to your mind. What's your proudest moment with artificial intelligence?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1231.6
text: Probably on the healthcare side, when I was in the Boston Scientific days, we rolled out a feature that was predictive, basically using signals from a pacemaker to predict heart failure. On average, it was 30 days in advance of when physicians were detected otherwise, which is a huge life-saving benefit.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1253.6
text: What worries you about artificial intelligence?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1256.6
text: Misuse. Misuse by bad actors, whether it's in military operations or in other types of nefarious activities. You can think of deep fakes as an example, just as it becomes more and more accessible and easy for everyone to use, I do have concerns.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1275.6
text: What's your favorite activity that involves no technology at all?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1278.6
text: Oh, crap. I was about to say photography, and then I realized, wait, that's not even a good example.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1284.6
text: Oh, no, actually, we can count that. I mean, it's not strictly artificial intelligence. We'll give you credit for that. What did you want to be when you were a child? What do you want to be when you grow up? AI engineer at eBay?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1295.6
text: I actually started as a creative writing major. So I guess writer was my initial passion.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1302.6
text: What's your greatest wish for what we're going to do with artificial intelligence in the future?

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1307.6
text: I think making it easier for almost anyone to make a living pursuing their passion.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1316.6
text: It's a great meeting and talking with you today. I think one thing that's going to resonate with a lot of our listeners is this idea that AI implementations are different than existing implementations like ERPs.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1329.6
text: That siloed approach that you might take towards a monolithic technology is very different when you involve lots of users and particularly when you involve your two platforms with both your customers and your sellers.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1342.6
text: Thanks for taking the time to talk with us. We really appreciate it. Thank you.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1345.6
text: Thank you for being with us. It's been quite insightful and really, really appreciate it.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1351.6
text: Thank you, Sherman.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1353.6
text: Thank you for joining us today. Next time, we'll talk with Helen Lee, technical fellow and regional director at Boeing. Please join us.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1363.6
text: Thanks for listening to Me, Myself and AI. We believe, like you, that the conversation about AI implementation doesn't start and stop with this podcast.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1371.6
text: That's why we've created a group on LinkedIn specifically for listeners like you.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1375.6
text: It's called AI for Leaders. And if you join us, you can chat with show creators and hosts, ask your own questions, share your insights and gain access to valuable resources about AI implementation from MIT SMR and BCG.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1388.6
text: You can access it by visiting MIT SMR dot com forward slash AI for Leaders.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1394.6
text: We'll put that link in the show notes and we hope to see you there.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1406.6
text: Thanks for listening to Me, Myself and AI. Our show is able to continue in large part due to listener support. Your streams and downloads make a big difference.

title: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov
id: Transforming Transactions with Technology - eBay's Nitzan Mekel-Bobrov-t1415.6
text: If you have a moment, please consider leaving us an Apple podcast review or a rating on Spotify and share our show with others you think might find it interesting and helpful.
